data.title: 1 - How To Get NoteIt?
data.description: Noteit is your new love language. Connect with your special partner or friend, share good moments and express the cutest messages through Noteit. Enjoy! It's Noteit time.

data.title: 2 - How To Use NoteIt Drawing?
data.description: Noteit is a new kind of relationship goals between partners and friends. This is because it allows the simultaneous and synchronous exchange of notes.

data.title: 3 - How To Get NoteIt Drawing?
data.description: Once installed, you immediately connect with your partner or friend through a code and that's it! You can now draw and write loving, cute and fun notes with a variety of brushes and colors available on Noteit.

data.title: 4 - Tips For NoteIt Drawing?
data.description: You can also pin a widget to your home screen and see the note whenever you unlock your device.

data.title: 5 - NoteIt Drawing For Couples
data.description: In addition, it allows you to record the good times on Noteit through the history of sent and received notes. Enjoy! Express yourself using Noteit.

data.title: 6 - Use NoteIt With Partner, Friends
data.description: Once installed, you immediately connect with your partner or friend through a code and that's it! You can now draw and write loving, cute and fun
